attributes.action: Introduce more free enclosed spaces for dogs in Margate,Thanet and all over UK!
attributes.additional_details:
Some dogs just can not be let of the lead, like huskies. 
We need more free enclosed spaces for our fur babies to run freely and safely, socialise, just like we would want our children to. There are big parks around us, and none have them. We need more in Thanet, Kent, and all over the UK!
attributes.background: We got our baby Husky a few months ago, and he is my first dog, I know, crazy right. It has been a wonderful steep learning curve, but the biggest learning curve has been the fact that, apart from one we know of a drive away, there are no FREE enclosed spaces for dogs near us in Margate and Thanet.

rejection.details:
This is a local issue and is the responsibility of Thanet District Council.

You can find out how to contact the council here:

https://www.thanet.gov.uk/get-in-touch/

You could raise the issue with local councillors who represent you. You can find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them, here:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
